menus.description: A rich and hearty Filipino beef stew simmered with tomatoes, liver spread, and vegetables.
A chewy, coconut-flavored Filipino dessert made from grated cassava and creamy custard topping.
Tender chicken skewers marinated in a sweet and savory Filipino-style barbecue sauce.
Soft, fluffy rolls swirled with cinnamon sugar and topped with creamy icing.
A savory Filipino stew made with pork and pig's blood, simmered in vinegar and spices.
Golden-fried pastry filled with savory ground meat, potatoes, and vegetables.
A soft, buttery brioche topped with sugar, cheese, and sometimes grated coconut.
A popular Filipino shaved ice dessert with mixed fruits, jellies, beans, leche flan, and ice cream.
A classic beef burger with lettuce, tomato, and condiments in a soft bun.
Leftover roasted pork simmered in a savory-sweet vinegar and liver sauce.
Soft, slightly sweet Filipino bread rolls commonly enjoyed for breakfast.
A fluffy chiffon cake topped with rich yema custard and grated cheese.
